Name: Australian Jewish Historical Society Victoria Inc

About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment. General reference assistance available; stamped addressed envelope is vital for mail enquiries. Copying services for books, journals and original records to A3 available.

About.Access: As much advance notice of visits as possible required. Access available for non-members by special arrangement. Closed period varies.

About.Acquisition focus: All records of public or private nature pertaining to the history of Jews in Australia, New Zealand and Pacific areas.

About.Major holdings: Various Jewish Communal Organisations: Minutes, Publications, Photographs 1800- . Private papers: Minutes, Publications, Photographs. Genealogical compilations: Charts, Photographs.

Contact.Note: There is presently no-one servicing this collection.
